column5: Anyone have step by steps for making a musky cradle?  Materials, instructions?  could you post? thanks
u can buy a luckystrike craddle at  canadian tire for about 30 bucks.
Cradles are hard to use, impossible if your alone and dangerous!   One of the many benefits of joining Muskies Canada is a great deal on a quality Muskie net!
i didn't know it could be dangerous. could you explain?
